Banshee.strength: Will target only one player at a time
Banshee.weakness: Crucifix effectiveness is increased to 5m against one

Demon.weakness: Using cursed possessions will lower sanity less

Goryo.strength: Can only be seen interacting with D.O.T.S. through a camera when nobody is nearby
Goryo.weakness: Tends to wander away less from its ghost room

Hantu.strength: Lower temperatures allow the Hantu to move faster
Hantu.weakness: Warmer areas slow the Hantu's movement

Jinn.strength: Travels at faster speeds if its victim is far away
Jinn.weakness: Cannot use its ability if the site's fuse box is off

Mare.strength: Has an increased chance to attack in the dark
Mare.weakness: Turning the lights on will reduce the chance of an attack

Myling.strength: Has quieter footsteps during a hunt

Obake.strength: May leave fingerprints that disappear quicker
Obake.weakness: Has a small chance of leaving six-fingered handprints

Oni.weakness: An Oni's increased activity makes them easier to find

Onryo.strength: A flame extinguishing can cause an Onryo to attack
Onryo.weakness: The presence of flames reduces the Onryo's ability to attack

Phantom.strength: Looking at a Phantom will lower the player's sanity considerably
Phantom.weakness: Taking a photo of the Phantom will cause it to briefly disappear

Poltergeist.strength: Capable of throwing multiple objects at once
Poltergeist.weakness: Becomes powerless with no throwables nearby

Raiju.weakness: Disrupts electronic equipment from further away when it hunts

Revenant.strength: Can travel significantly faster if a player is spotted during a hunt
Revenant.weakness: Moves very slowly when not chasing a player

Shade.strength: Being shy makes it more difficult to locate and obtain evidence
Shade.weakness: Less likely to hunt if multiple people are nearby

Spirit.weakness: Smudge sticks are more effective, preventing a hunt for longer

The Mimic.strength: Can mimic the abilities and traits of other ghosts
The Mimic.weakness: Will present Ghost Orbs as a secondary evidence

The Twins.strength: Either Twin may start a hunt, though not at the same time
The Twins.weakness: Will often interact with the environment at the same time

Wraith.strength: Does not leave UV footprints after stepping in salt
Wraith.weakness: Will become more active if it steps in salt

Yokai.strength: Talking near the Yokai will anger it, increasing the chance to attack
Yokai.weakness: Can only hear voices close to it during a hunt

Yurei.strength: Has a stronger effect on sanity
Yurei.weakness: Smudging the Yurei's ghost room will reduce how often it wanders
